DOC.brief_summary: Sleep complex physiologic behavioral process essential rest , repair , well-being , survival . Sleep define periodic , reversible state cognitive sensory disengagement external environment . Critically ill patient experience poor sleep quality . Surveys ICU survivor show sleep disruption , pain intubation mechanical ventilation major source anxiety stress ICU stay . Many physiological , psychological environmental factor contribute incidence sleep disruption ICU patient . The primary physiologic factor document literature pain , medication illness.The primary psychological factor document literature stress worry . Environmental factor include noise , patient care activity therapeutic modality mechanical ventilation . Our research aim impact effective intervention like use ear plug eye mask decrease light exposure promote sleep ICU patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Ear Plug Eye Mask Sleeping Quality Critically Ill Patients
DOC.detailed_description: 50 patient age range 18- 60 year admit ICU Assiut university hospital randomly allocate two group ( control group intervention group ) .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old . Mechanically ventilated patient . Conscious patient . No hearing problem . No eye disease . Not receive narcotic drug five six hour sleep time night . No underlying disease affect sleep rheumatoid arthritis migraine . Exclusion Criteria Head injury . Psychiatric disease . Shocked patient
